long_description: Use the medium padded SealLine Computer Sleeve to give your 15 in. laptop the protection it deserves when you're traveling around the world or commuting to work. Fully taped seams, padded walls and a convertible roll-top closure defend your prized laptop from weather, bumps and urban grime. PVC-free, 210-denier polyurethane-coated polyester is long lasting. Handle and shoulder strap attachments offer multiple carrying options; shoulder strap not included. Interior pocket keeps chargers and such organized when you're on the go. Closeout.
short_description: Use the medium padded SealLine Computer Sleeve to give your 15 in. laptop the protection it deserves when you're traveling around the world or commuting to work.
